description: Expose init() to register a window-level key listener for Tab and chat hotkeys.

functions.name: init
functions.description: Initialise Tab key capture for existing and future 3-pane windows.

functions.name: shutdown
functions.description: Clean up Tab key listeners and unregister window listeners.

events.name: onTabPressed
events.description: Fired when the Tab key is pressed in the message list.

events.name: onShiftTabPressed
events.description: Fired when Shift+Tab is pressed in the message list.

events.name: onChatHotkey
events.description: Fired when the configured chat hotkey (Cmd+Alt+L) is pressed in a 3-pane window.
